item.description:
Hello one and all. It has been a long time and more people have joined and I didn't send welcome messages and all of that. Sorry. Welcome to everyone who has shown an interest in storytelling in Cambridge! On December 27th at 9:30 at Improv Boston's Cabaret Theater (the one off to the right when you walk in) there will be a holiday show. Come listen to stories about family holiday fun and madness. It is $7 to get in. There are no nametags but if you say hey after the show I will be happy to chat. Just make sure to say, "I am in the meetup group" so I know who you are. Also in place of the nametag you can also just verbally express your name.

Hope you all can make it. It is a fun and relaxed show. Very laid back, tell your friends!

-Jess

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group

item.name: Holiday Stories at Improv Boston
